info: ['Develop comprehensive project plans and schedules, outlining scope, key project milestones, timelines, budgets, and resource requirements.Collaborate with cross-functional teams to define project objectives and deliverables.', 'Lead and motivate project teams, ensuring efficient and effective collaboration.Manage\xa0and provide research and documentation in the delivery of project development plans.Monitor and control project activities, resolving issues identifying and mitigating potential risks as they arise.Coordinate with contractors, architects, quantity surveyors, quality assurance, engineers, and other stakeholders to meet project milestones.', 'Defining resource requirements and managing resource availability & allocation – both\xa0internal and third-party.Outline a budget based on requirements and track costs to deliver the project on budget.Manage project budgets, track expenditures and ensure financial goals are met.Allocate and optimize resources to meet project objectives and timelines.Managing and adjusting for project scope, schedule and/or budget changes.Assist in project-based accounting processes.', 'Communicate regularly with clients, providing updates on project progress and addressing\xa0concerns.Manage relationships and communication with clients and all stakeholders, ensuring the project is delivered satisfactorily.Foster positive relationships with staff and key stakeholders, including government agencies, community representatives, and regulatory bodies.', 'Maintain accurate project documentation, including contracts, permits, and approvals.Track projects prepare and present regular progress reports to senior management and stakeholders.Review legal documents for company and project structuring, risk management, and tax issues.', "Experience Level: Senior level, Minimum 5 - 7 years of relevant experience in the real estate construction sector on mid to high-rise building construction developmentsEducation: Bachelor's degree in Civil/Structural Engineering, Architecture, Real Estate and Management, or Technical Project Management.Certification: Project Management Professional (PMP) or equivalent in real estate and other professional certificationsA master's degree is a plusExcellent client-facing and internal communication skills.Excellent verbal and written communication skills.Proficiency in project management software and MS Office suite.Attention to detail and multi-tasking skills.Willing to relocate to Abuja"]

funders.Cultivate Relationships with Funders: Build and maintain relationships with grant-making organizations, including attending meetings and networking events as necessary.Collaborate with Internal Teams: Work closely with program staff to gather necessary information for proposals and reports, and ensure alignment of grant-funded projects with organizational objectives.", "Conduct comprehensive research to identify new funding opportunities.Maintain a calendar of grant deadlines and ensure timely submission of proposals.Develop compelling grant proposals and letters of inquiry, including gathering and formatting information, writing narratives, and preparing budgets.Customize proposals to meet the specific requirements of each funding opportunity.Monitor and manage the lifecycle of grants from application to closing, ensuring compliance with all grant conditions.Prepare and submit regular progress reports to funders, ensuring all reporting requirements are met.Establish and nurture relationships with current and potential funders.Represent Illmi Children's Fund at meetings and conferences to promote the organization and seek new funding opportunities.Work with program staff to develop project plans and budgets for grant proposals.Ensure all team members are informed about grant-related activities and timelines.", "Bachelor’s degree in English, Communications, Nonprofit Management, or a related field.Minimum 3-5 years of experience in grant writing and fundraising, preferably in the nonprofit sector.Proven track record of successful grant proposals and securing funding.Excellent written and verbal communication skills.Strong research skills and attention to detail.Ability to manage multiple projects and meet deadlines.Proficiency in Microsoft Office Suite and grant management software.Ability to work independently and as part of a team.Strong organizational skills and the ability to handle sensitive information confidentially.Passion for Illmi Children's Fund’s mission and social good."]

info: ['Financial Recordkeeping: Maintain and update financial records, including ledgers, journals, and bank statements.Accounts Payable & Receivable: Manage accounts payable and receivable, including invoicing, payment\xa0processing, and reconciling discrepancies.Budgeting & Forecasting: Assist in the preparation of budgets and financial forecasts, providing analysis\xa0and recommendations.Financial Reporting: Prepare and present financial statements, reports, and summaries in accordance\xa0with accounting standards and regulations.Tax Compliance: Ensure timely and accurate filing of tax returns and other regulatory documents.Audit Preparation: Assist with internal and external audits, providing necessary documentation and\xa0information.Cash Flow Management: Monitor and manage cash flow, ensuring sufficient liquidity for operational\xa0needs.Cost Analysis: Conduct cost analysis and provide recommendations for cost control and reduction.Payroll Processing: Oversee payroll processing, ensuring compliance with payroll laws and accurate\xa0disbursement of employee wages.Internal Controls: Develop and implement internal controls to safeguard company assets and ensure\xa0financial accuracy.Software Proficiency: Utilize accounting software (e.g., QuickBooks) for day-to-day financial operations\xa0and reporting.Communication: Liaise with external stakeholders, including banks, auditors, and tax authorities, as\xa0needed.Continuous Improvement: Identify and implement process improvements to enhance the efficiency and\xa0effectiveness of the accounting function.', 'Bachelor’s degree in Accounting, Finance, or a related field.Certified Public Accountant (CPA) designation is preferred.Minimum of 3 years of experience in accounting or finance.Proficiency in accounting software (e.g., QuickBooks, Xero) and MS Office Suite, particularly Excel.Strong understanding of accounting principles, standards, and regulations.Excellent analytical, problem-solving, and organizational skills.Attention to detail and accuracy in financial reporting.Strong communication skills, both written and verbal.Ability to work independently and collaboratively in a team environment.High level of integrity and confidentiality.', 'Performance-based bonuses.HMO']

info: ["Provide friendly and knowledgeable assistance to customers, both in-person and over the phoneRespond promptly to clients' inquiries, concerns, and complaints, and work to resolve issues in a timely and effective mannerActively engage with clients to understand their needs and preferences, and recommend appropriate products and\xa0 servicesCollaborate with the sales team to generate new leads, schedule appointments, and close sales Maintain accurate and up-to-date records of all\xa0 interactions and sales activitiesParticipate in team meetings and training sessions to stay informed of product updates, company policies, and industry trends", 'High school diploma or equivalent1-5 years of experience in a\xa0 customer service or sales role, preferably in a retail or service-based environmentStrong\xa0 communication and interpersonal skills, with the ability to effectively engage with customersExcellent problem-solving and critical thinking skillsProficient with Digital marketing and Social media.Ability to work in a fast-paced, team-oriented environmentAvailability to work Monday to Friday']

info: ['Content Creation: Develop and produce engaging, diverse, and relevant content tailored to our talent pool, ensuring it aligns with our brand and messaging.Audience Engagement: Attract and build relationships with potential applicants through interactive and appealing content.Account Management: Manage two TikTok accounts – one targeting our talent pool and focusing on applicants, and the other aimed at business owners.Brand Representation: Serve as the face of our brand on TikTok and Instagram, creating content that informs and excites talent about our company.Growth Strategy: Implement strategies to grow our audience and followers on both TikTok and Instagram.Collaboration: Work closely with the marketing team to ensure cohesive messaging and branding across all social media platforms.', 'Proven experience managing social media accounts, specifically TikTok and Instagram.Strong content creation skills with a portfolio showcasing engaging and diverse content.Excellent communication and relationship-building skills.Creative and innovative mindset with the ability to generate fresh ideas.Ability to understand and target content towards different audiences – talent pool and business owners.Knowledge of social media trends and best practices.', 'Experience in the talent acquisition or HR industry.Understanding of branding and marketing principles.Ability to analyze social media metrics and adjust strategies accordingly.', 'Submit a portfolio showcasing your previous work on TikTok and Instagram.Provide examples of content created for different target audiences.']

info: ['Create and manage social media editorial calendars and schedulesCreate, design, and publish engaging content ( graphics, photos, and video content) for posting on all social media platforms.Optimize LVL pages on all social media platforms to increase visibility.Create and publish engaging content (write-ups) for posting on all social media platforms.Work with Product Champions to generate content for daily broadcasts on all social media platformsRegularly design and dispatch newsletters, promotions, and social campaigns (create and upload videos, etc.)Consult with the Sales & Purchases department on new products to give special highlights on social media platforms.Ensure daily dispatch of customer birthday greetings via the spread-the-word platform', 'Manage online reviews and responses\xa0Devise strategies to drive online traffic to the company website and brick & mortarEnsure LVL is listed in various search engines e.g. Google, ask.com, etcEnsure electronic versions of LVL publications are available onlineCreate online relationships with other sites and blogs that may have similar audiences e.g. GTB SME Hub, Sermoncentral.com', 'Continuously improve by capturing and analyzing the appropriate social data/metrics, insights, and best practices, and then acting on the informationWeekly report on the effectiveness of campaigns', 'Minimum of 3 years of work experience.B.Sc/HND academic qualification']

info: ['Promote the company’s products/services addressing or predicting clients’ objectivesDevelop technical and commercial knowledge of all our product offerings and services.Identify immediate and long-term needs of clients for the company’s products and services on such\xa0projects.Market for both oil, gas, and power funding requests and funding sources (international\xa0and local)Good knowledge of conferences, and exhibitions associated with oil and gas (local and\xa0international)Market oil and gas stakeholders for Energia productsArrange meetings between Engineering & Procurement Companies and our partners.Prospect for and acquire new and financially viable high-volume customersGather new intelligence for the preparation of reports, tenders, and presentations that will win the\xa0company contracts in ongoing and upcoming projects.Define a strategy for relating with each customer group and create a Customer Relationship Plan per\xa0groupInterfacing with industry regulators and following up on submitted tenders.Generate work orders, Request for Quotation (RFQ) and Purchase Orders (P0)Effectively manage each customer account to ensure sales targets are fully achievedEnsure full payment for all supplies and servicesDemonstrate consistent sales development success and target-driven achievements.', "A good degree in Engineering, Sales/Marketing, Business Admin, Economics, or a related disciplineA minimum of 3-5 years cognate experience in similar position in the oil and gas sector with records of\xa0accomplishment.Have a good knowledge of the oil and gas industry's current issues and stakeholdersGood knowledge of conferences, and exhibitions associated with oil and gas (local and\xa0international)Knowledge of the PIA and other regulations associated with the sectorGood presentation skills especially PowerPoint and Excel"]

info: ['Listen to customers’ concerns, issues and questionsResolve customers’ concerns and answer customers’ questions to your best abilityMaintain a positive attitude and calmly respond to customers’ complaintsOpen new customer accountsAttract customers by promoting the product and company positively, answering questions and addressing concerns as they ariseRecommend possible products to meet the customers’ needsRefer issues and questions to managers if necessaryPrepare product and customer reports by gathering data collected during customer interactions.Conduct periodic surveys on customer satisfactionManage and supervision of staff to ensure customer satisfactionHandle employee inquiries and support HR operations.Maintain HR recordsHelp ensure compliance with company policies and regulations.Coordinate employee training programs and development initiatives.', 'Bachelor’s degree in Business Administration, Social Science, or a related field.Strong organizational skills and attention to detail.Excellent communication and interpersonal abilities.Proficiency in MS Office; familiarity with HRIS a plus.', 'Attention to Detail, Highly Organized, Team Oriented and LeadershipHigh Tolerance for Stress, Problem Management (analysis and resolution)Customer Service Orientation, Relationship Builder, High level of IntegrityBehavior and Passion for Excellence, Self-motivated and goal-oriented, desire to deliver\xa0resultsPassionate about Human resources, Fast learner and quick thinker, Ability to adapt and grow\xa0in a competitive environment', 'Experience in Human Resources and Competency in EnglishExcellent Communication skills, Time and Priority Management Skills,People Management and Negotiation Skills, Superior Analytical, Strategic Planning and Development', 'Microsoft Office Productivity Tools and CRM Trouble Ticketing Tool, CRM Solutions, SalesForce Solutions', 'Event Management, Sales Processes, Customer Care Processes']
